name: DEMON LOOP - Ludum Dare 47
description:
Demons are running amok! Create magical barriers with your wands to send them away! Make sure you take out the summoning marks on the ground too or the demons will keep coming!

Collect power ups to increase your wand range and the number of wands you can place.

---------------------

My Compo submission for Ludum Dare 47: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/demon-loop

---------------------

Controls

WASDMove Character
Left Click
Place Wand
Right Click
Remove All Wands (Destroys Demons Caught In Field)
SpaceDash & Invulnerable
EscapePause
